bwwExcerpt: : Not that the thumping, pumping Moulin Rouge allows you to dwell on its misogyny. This is musical as spectacle, so if you don't exactly feel the peril and passion of Christian and Satine's doomed romance, then no matter, because another visual bonbon will be thrown at you soon enough.

keyPhrases.quote: Not that the thumping, pumping Moulin Rouge allows you to dwell on its misogyny
if you don't exactly feel the peril and passion of Christian and Satine's doomed romance, then no matter

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges the show's spectacle value but criticizes its substance, suggesting it compensates for narrative weaknesses with visual elements - a mixed assessment without clear recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review acknowledges the spectacle of the show but highlights significant issues with its themes, leading to a mixed recommendation.
